lead_paragraph: The United States and Russia said they had won agreement for a new partial truce after a bloody week, but that it would not immediately include Aleppo.

headline.print_headline: Partial Truce Caps a Week of Bloodshed Across Syria
headline.main: Partial Truce Said to Be Restored in Syria, but Not Yet in Aleppo

snippet: The United States and Russia said they had won agreement for a new partial truce after a bloody week, but that it would not immediately include Aleppo.
abstract: United States and Russia say they have negotiated partial truce in Syria following most violent week in months; truce does not include Aleppo, though officials say they are working to include city.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: White Helmets (Syrian Civil Defense Volunteer Group)
